item.title: Ranking News Bias in Python
item.description: I recently read an article in the Washington Post titled, “Ranking the media from liberal to conservative, based on their audiences”. Inspiring me to rank news sites based on their subjectivity and polarity on a given subject, in this case, Donald Trump. Photo by rawpixel on Unsplash I used Python to pull the following news sites for their 30 most recent articles that contained the keyword “Trump” (ranging from the liberal side of the Washington Post article to the conservative side):
